title: 3D Geometry Instructional Design: Visual Tools for Pre-Service Teachers' Socio-Spatial Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic geometric concepts, instructional design principles, social interaction, and cultural diversity understanding
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Focused on improving middle school teachers' ability to instruct Plans and Elevations. Developing visual teaching strategies using digital tools like SketchUp Make and fostering a socio-constructivist learning environment

learning_goals: Analyzing 3D geometry concepts according to the van Hiele levels of geometric thought and socioconstructivist learning theory.
Designing and implementing instructional activities for visual-spatial ability and spatial relationship comprehension.

Developing strategies for selecting and applying visual materials considering learners' proficiency levels and cultural backgrounds
Improving instructional strategies based on formative assessment results and learner feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
